title: Battery notifier - Reborn
summary: This app plays a repeating notification when battery is fully pr low charged
description: I'm an obsessive-compulsive care of my phone :-), and I do not like to leave it charging overnight.So I finally decided to develop a small utility that notifies every X minutes when the battery is charged, in order to remove the charger.Also, I added a feature to notify when the battery charge is low.You can set the notification ringtone, interval between notifications, number of notifications, charger type...Finally, I have added information at the statusbar related to the time since device boot, last charge...and also a icon with the current battery charge...I hope you find it useful.Please, post errors and get additional information at the official XDA thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=20375918 or via emailPRO features: Remove Ads
descriptionHTML:
I'm an obsessive-compulsive care of my phone :-),
and I do not like to leave it charging overnight.

So I finally decided to develop a small utility that notifies every X minutes when the battery is charged, in order to remove the charger.

Also, I added a feature to notify when the battery charge is low.

You can set the notification ringtone, interval between notifications, number of notifications, charger type...

Finally, I have added information at the statusbar related to the time since device boot, last charge...
and also a icon with the current battery charge...

I hope you find it useful.

Please, post errors and get additional information at the official XDA thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=20375918 or via email

PRO features: Remove Ads
comments: Xiaomi Mi Max (Android 6) Doesn't work on Xiaomi Mi Max now. Hope the developer can fix it.
oppo r7s doesnt work anymore in android 5.1.1
Very good It works very well. I was using a different app that did not work sometimes. Am happy to get this app.
recentChanges: Updated Google Play Services library to version 11.6.0
